data.name: LocoMotives
data.detailed_description: LocoMotives(TM) is a family fun game, set in the Old West when constructing railroads was the adventure! Play the role of a Wild West Rail Baron and be the first to connect your rail line from the harbor to the new frontier! Beware of Bandits, Thieves, Destroyers  - bad men and women of every ilk abound!  Sheriffs and Marshals are there to keep the peace, but conflict can break out at any moment, ending in a Showdown!  Get your track built across the river and to the Station first and your the winner!
data.about_the_game: LocoMotives(TM) is a family fun game, set in the Old West when constructing railroads was the adventure! Play the role of a Wild West Rail Baron and be the first to connect your rail line from the harbor to the new frontier! Beware of Bandits, Thieves, Destroyers  - bad men and women of every ilk abound!  Sheriffs and Marshals are there to keep the peace, but conflict can break out at any moment, ending in a Showdown!  Get your track built across the river and to the Station first and your the winner!
data.short_description: LocoMotives: a Town Building, Track Laying and Gun Slinging fun game for all!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 8x
  • Processor: 1.6 GHz or higher processor
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Sound Card: N/A
  • Additional Notes: Requirements vary by the add-ons installed
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 8 or Windows 10
  • Processor: 2.0 GHz processor or higher
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GFX card recommended for best quality
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Sound Card: N/A
  • Additional Notes: Requirements vary by the add-ons installed
